document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of type specimens of molluscs in the collection of The Manchester Museum, The University of Manchester, UK

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of type specimens of molluscs in the collection of The Manchester Museum, The University of Manchester, UK

mods:name.mods:affiliation: mANCHESTER MUSEUM UNIVERSITY OF MANCHESTER ,, United Kingdom

paragraph.heading:
tagbilleranus,
Geophorus (Diplopinax) Bartsch 1918: 656
.
Nomen nudum in Bartsch

subSubSection.paragraph: 1918: 655. Tagbileran, Bohol , Philippines . Seven paratypes E.3677 {Smithsonian

Institution}.
taphrodes ,
Tropidorissoia Tomlin and Shackleford 1915: 307
; pl. 5, fig. 5. S.
Thomé. Four paratypes [‘type’ in British Museum (Natural History), vide p.309]

texistriatum,
Ceras Spence 1923: 21
; pl. 1, fig. 3. Elizabetha. Holotype (the only specimen described) EE.6352 {Spence}.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
thaumasia ,
Rissoina (Morchiella) Melvill and Standen 1898a: 31
; pl. 1, fig. 3. Madras. Holotype (the only specimen described) EE.7851 {Henderson}.

subSubSection.paragraph: themeropsis, Drillia Melvill and Standen 1896: 278 ; pl. 9, fig. 10. Loyalty Islands . Holotype (or figured syntype ) EE.3783 and one possible paratype / syntype EE.8110 {Hadfield}. Refigured in Kilburn 1994 : figs. 84-85, and referred to as holotype (p. 223).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
theskela ,
Mangilia (Glyphostoma) Melvill and Standen 1895: 97
; pl. 3, fig. 26. Lifu. Holotype (the only specimen described) EE.3788 {Hadfield}.

thomsoni ,
Diplommatina Godwin-Austen 1892: 514
. South Burrail. Three syntypes EE.3511/130 {Collier}.

thyridota ,
Mangilia (Glyphostoma)
Melvill and Standen 1896: 292
; pl. 10, fig. 35. Loyalty Islands . Holotype (the only specimen described) EE.3791{Hadfield}.

subSubSection.paragraph:
torresiense,
Bittium Melvill and Standen 1899b: 168
; pl. 10, fig. 6. Station 14, channels between reefs, Mèr [Torres Straits]. Two syntypes EE.7854 {Haddon}.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
transcendens ,
Cardium (Trachycardium) Melvill and Standen 1899b: 191
; pl. 11, fig. 21. Torres Straits [ vide p.150]. One syntype EE.7909 {Haddon}.

tricarinata ,
Leucorhynchia
Melvill and Standen 1896: 311
; pl. 11, fig. 75. Loyalty Islands . Holotype (the only specimen described) EE.3793 {Hadfield}.

subSubSection.paragraph:
trochoideum,
Craspedopoma Lowe 1860b: 117
. In convalle “Rib. do Inferno” dicta orae Septentr. Maderae. Two syntypes [‘Madeira’] EE.1710 {Preston 1907, ex Wollaston}.

tumida ,
Diplommatina Godwin-Austen 1870: 6
; pl. 2, fig. 1. Burrail range near Nenglo, N. Cachar hills, in forest, and as usual among decaying leaves. Two syntypes [nr. Asala, N Cachar] EE.3511/141 {Collier}.
